Method.name: zfTabSymb
Method.Description:
Symbolik pro tabulku souboru v zobrazovaku

15.01.19 ln; ikona pres font, odkaz do noveho tabu
Method.Implementation:
$$$HandleOK(handle) ; kontrola handle q:psLine="" "" ; povinna cast, vratit prazdny retezec pokud je bunka prazdna
s ext=##class(User.MARC).getSubTagStr(.psLine,psSubTag) q:$case(ext,"zip":0,"rar":0,"gz":0,"tgz":0,"7z":0,:1) ""
s repo=##class(User.MARC).getSubTagStr(.psLine,"r") s key=##class(User.MARC).getSubTagStr(.psLine,"k")
; 15.01.19 ln; ikona pres font, odkaz do noveho tabu q ##class(i2.html.tpl).getLink("archlist","repo="_repo_"&key="_key,,"x"" rel=""external"" target=""_blank","icon-info")
